task.title: Modify the Planned Start and End dates of a Work Order

taskbody.prereq: You can modify the planned start and end dates of a work order only if it is in the In Progress, Ready, and On Hold state.

step.cmd: In the Order Management page, select a line in the Line drop-down list box.
step.stepresult: The Released page appears, displaying a list of work orders associated with the selected line.

step.cmd: In the Released page, select a work order in the table.
step.stepresult: The Work Order page appears, displaying the status of the work order.
The Edit Work Order window appears, displaying planned start and end dates of the work order.

step.cmd: In the box, enter a date and time when the work order is planned to begin.

info.note: You can also select to select a date and time.

step.cmd: As needed, modify values in the PLANNED END DATE, PLANNED START DATE boxes.

info.note: You can also select to select a date and time.

step.cmd: In the PRIORITY box, you can modify the priority of the work order.

info.note: The quantity must be a positive integer, where 1 denotes the highest priority and 0 denotes the lowest priority. If you do not enter a value in the PRIORITY box for a work order, a message appears indicating that you must enter a value.

taskbody.result: The changes made to the planned start and end dates of the work order are saved.
